# 高階代碼掃描系統依賴
# Advanced Code Scanning System Dependencies

# 安全掃描工具 - 固定版本以防供應鏈攻擊
# Security scanning tools - Pinned to exact versions to prevent supply-chain risks from unvetted releases
bandit==1.7.10
safety==2.3.5

# Web 框架 - 固定版本以防供應鏈攻擊
# Pinned to exact versions to prevent supply-chain risks from unvetted releases
safety==3.2.11

# Web 框架 - 固定版本以防供應鏈攻擊
# Web framework - Pinned to exact versions to prevent supply-chain risks from unvetted releases
flask==3.0.3
werkzeug==3.1.4

# 數據處理
# Python 標準庫已包含所需模組：
# - json
# - os
# - sys
# - re
# - ast
# - pathlib
# - datetime
# - typing
# - dataclasses
# - collections
